column4: Hi. I'm running Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and wanted to install VMware-Workstation-Full-8.0.3-******.x86_64.bundle. Well, I ran sudo sh VMware-Workstation-Full-8.0.2-**.x86_64.bundle. The installation runs smoothly but when i launch VMWorkstation the following message and question appears: data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAfYAAACECAIAAADtFJ6VAAAgAElEQVR4nO29d1QbWZ6wzf77fe/2hDPn7Oy8++63e3Zn9j3
